div.bibl: The American Jewish Year Book. 5662. September 14, 1901, to October 1, 1902. Edited by Cyrus Adler.

body.p: BEQUESTS AND GIFTS. (Above $1,000). From Jews to Jewish and non-Jewish Institutions in the United States. August 25, 1900, to August 10, 1901. In Chicago.
Leon Mandel gives $25,000 to the University of Chicago.
The children of Jacob and Hannah Rosenberg give $25,000 to the Michael Reese Hospital of Chicago.
Abraham Slimmer, of Waverly Iowa, gives $20,000 to the Beth Moshav Zekeinim of Chicago.
